price: Kitapta İbrahim’i de an. O son derece doğru sözlü bir peygamberdi.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
